description:
Panda has decided it is time for him to move out and goes apartment searching with 
his butler, Mr. Penguin.   Polar Bear`s Café and Grizzly`s Bar are teaming up to 
run a food stall with a special gust, Panda’s “older brother” or something like that.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare no Hitorigurashi / Natsu no Omatsuri
The Ideal Single Living / Summer Festival
憧れの一人暮らし / 夏のお祭り
